root.name: Mountain King
root.description: Mountain King is an Atari 2600 game where the goal is to collect pieces of a crown. When you collect all of them, the game plays "In the Hall of the Mountain King". The main enemy in the game is a spider who can catch you and cocoon you. Â If caught by the spider, you have some time to wiggle yourself free. If the spider passes by you once you can live but if he passes twice, you die.
